q: by Police Hours before Shooting Kirsten Gillibrand said that everyone present in Gabrielle Giffords ' hospital room, but especially her husband Mark Kelly, were "just crying with joy" when Gabrielle Giffords opened her eyes. We know that she will overcome this. If anyone in the world can overcome an injury, of a severe nature, it's her, Kirsten Gillibrand said. My point is that these bastards find a way to funnel money their way even when they're supposedly looking to CUT budgets. I'd have more respect for Colin Powell if he said something like, We need to cut the number of active troops to save money and let's do it without giving millions to Halliburton during the process this time. Absolutely. During the 2000 GOP convention... Dick Cheney proclaimed "Help is on the Way." The crowed roared...... but he was talking to the Defense Contractors.
